settings.text: Don’t worry - we’ll get you driving again in no time.

settings.content: Our do-it-yourself solutions require one working key. However, we know life happens and sometimes you lose your only car key. Our partners can help you make a new key. Two options to help:

settings.title: Car Keys Express
settings.content: We’ve partnered with Car Keys Express to give you an exclusive discount. They have hundreds of vans that make car keys and remote fobs in over 90% of the United States and parts of Canada. Check pricing and availability of their incredibly convenient options to get a key made for your vehicle.

settings.title: Find a Locksmith Service
settings.content: We've got a direct line to meet your local locksmith needs. If you prefer the personal touch, just call our partner to be connected with a reliable local locksmith. It's that simple – no stress, no hassle.

Disclaimer: This free service assists vehicle owners in connecting with local service providers. All service providers are independent and Tom’s Key Company does not warrant or guarantee any service performed or product offered by service providers. It is the responsibility of the vehicle owner to verify that the hired provider furnishes the necessary skills, license, and insurance required (where applicable) for the work being performed. All persons depicted in a photo or video are actors or models and not actual service providers.

Affiliate Notice: Tom’s Key Company earns a commission on any purchases made through third party service providers.
